body_html: Thanks for contributing this! One suggestion: since libsvm format is primarily used for representing sparse data, would it make sense for this op to return a tf.SparseTensor of features?
body_text: Thanks for contributing this! One suggestion: since libsvm format is primarily used for representing sparse data, would it make sense for this op to return a tf.SparseTensor of features?
body: Thanks for contributing this! One suggestion: since libsvm format is primarily used for representing sparse data, would it make sense for this op to return a `tf.SparseTensor` of features?
